overview: Beginning on a naval base in San Diego, California, a hot, butch, blonde, sailor - engineer surveys his warship docked in the blue-watered bay. The cold, stark, solitude of the ship adds to the mystery of a package the American sailor suddenly receives from somewhere in the middle East. Wrapped in Arab language newspaper, a DVD is discovered. The sailor pops the DVD into his laptop in a secluded area on the ship and watches and first with trepidation and perplexment, but then with amazement and erotic pleasure!
title: Arabian Men 1
